NE – Sen. Deb Fischer (R) and Sen. Ben Sasse (R)

Committees

Deb Fischer is the #5 Republican on the Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

Ben Sasse is not on any of our key committees.

------  --------------------------------  ------------
